body: We'll it's finally here. I have decided to leave avicus. I have been playing on this server for about 7 months now and I have just gotten tired of hackers and the bullying on the server. Plus it has also gotten boring. I will miss all the friends I have made on this server and I wish them good luck. Perhaps you will see my on other servers but for now good bye to all.
body_tagged: We'll it's finally here. I have decided to leave avicus. I have been playing on this server for about 7 months now and I have just gotten tired of hackers and the bullying on the server. Plus it has also gotten boring. I will miss all the friends I have made on this server and I wish them good luck. Perhaps you will see my on other servers but for now good bye to all.
title: Good Bye.....

replies.body:
Sorry, but leaving post are annoying!
And not for only me.
If you go, then you go and don't make a post about it.
You can contact your server friends via skype, teamspeak or something like that!
Maybe this is rude, but I HATE LEAVING POST and it's my opinion.
